name: poison-heal

effect.black_white: Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.black_2_white_2: Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.

flavor_text.black_white: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
